title: Docker Port Binding Issue
content: When deploying containers, port collisions can occur if multiple services use the same port. Recommended to use dynamic port allocation in Docker Compose.
author: Alice

title: Kubernetes Pod Restart Policy
content: Configure the pod restartPolicy as Always or OnFailure depending on workload. This avoids unexpected pod termination issues.
author: Bob

title: API Rate Limiting Best Practices
content: Use token buckets or leaky bucket algorithms to avoid throttling issues and maintain SLA compliance.
author: Charlie

title: Database Connection Pooling
content: Set max connections based on expected load. Avoid exhausting database connections which may cause service downtime.
author: Diana
